content: get ready to crochet the stylish diamond hat perfect for teens and adults this intermediate-level pattern features a cabled design with post stitches worked seamlessly in the round from the top down with written instructions and a video tutorial you ll master this hat in no time two sizes and two styles included for ultimate customization **unique features-** intermediate level pattern stylish cabled design with post stitches seamless construction for a polished finish written instructions and video tutorials for easy understanding matching diamond cowl pattern available **materials needed-** hook 5 5mm us size 9 0 yarn shown in red heart hygge charm aran weight 150-200 yards
